txt.en: I, Signoth, of sound mind, do bequeath this house and land to whoever first finds this parchment, for that person is the one who cares for this property the most.\n\nShould both Sigun and Sigmar find this together, then the house and land remain bequeathed to both sons, not as a punishment, but as a father's last wish that his sons should get along. I hope it is the latter.
